programme.title: Men of Honor
Men Of Honor
programme.desc: The film is inspired by the true story of Carl Brashear, first African American master diver in US Navy, and the man who trained him.(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne.(n)

programme.title: The Siege
programme.desc: Denzel Washington as a federal agent investigating terrorist bombings in New York City, which is placed under martial law when the culprits evade capture.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the third installment of the Planet of the Apes prequel series -- which depicts the events that led to the primates taking control of Earth -- simian leader Caesar (played via motion capture by Andy Serkis) is horrified when his family are killed during an attack by humans on his communityCaesar soon plots revenge on the Colonel (Woody Harrelson), the human military leader behind the assault, which threatens to ignite all-out war between the two speciesDirected by Matt Reeves.(n)

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Techno-expert Michael is offered big money for having three years of his memory erasedBut after the job there's no cash, he's wanted for murder and people are trying to kill himSci-fi thriller.(n)

programme.title: Reversal of Fortune
programme.desc: Jeremy Irons won an Oscar for his performance as real-life millionaire Claus von Bulow, who was a charged with the murder of his wife.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ambitious young investment banker Jacob Moore discovers that greed is still the name of the game when he forges a fragile alliance with former Wall Street hotshot Gordon Gekko after Gekko is released from prison.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop 2
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.(n)

programme.title: Term Life
programme.desc: A professional thief takes his estranged daughter on the lam when a job goes awryAs crooks and corrupt cops close in on them, he also takes out a life-insurance policy on himself in an effort to leave something behind for his daughter.(n)

programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: A docudrama about the adrenaline junkie and adventurer, Aron Ralston, who was trapped in a Utah canyon for five days with his hand stuck under a boulderAfter a hundred and twenty-seven hours of staying pinned to the canyon wall, he eventually resorts to desperate measures in order to escapeTune in to catch this inspirational yet gut-wrenching story.(n)

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: Director Roger Donaldson teams up with star Kevin Costner for another political thriller (after their 1987 pairing, No Way Out), only this time with a film based on the actual events surrounding the Cuban missile crisis of 1962, taking place during the titular thirteen days wherein the U.Sand the Soviet Union nearly engaged in full-scale nuclear warAfter President John FKennedy (Bruce Greenwood) is shown photographs from a spy plane detailing the presence of missiles in Cuba capable of obliterating massive areas of the U.S., he must immediately decide the most effective course of action for the countryWith the aid of best friend and special assistant Kenny O'Donnell (Kevin Costner) and brother Robert (Steven Culp), the President must avoid a dire chain of events that could be dictated by General Curtis LeMay (Kevin Conway), who would rather take immediate action and invade CubaAfter initial reticence about leaking the information to the nation, President Kennedy eventually tells of the conflict, leading to widespread panic and a blockade of CubaWith the aid of Robert McNamara (Dylan Baker) and Adlai Stevenson (Michael Fairman), the leaders must find a way to alleviate the tension of the situationThirteen Days also features Walter Adrian as Lyndon Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Frantic
programme.desc: Suspense thriller in which the wife of an American doctor vanishes from a Paris hotel room, sending the surgeon on a hectic search that draws him into the city's criminal underworld and the realm of international espionageFaced with uncooperative authorities, he sets out to track down his wife himselfThe trail leads him to a streetwise and sensual young female drug trafficker and a global-scale terrorist plot.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich battles zombies and a sinister corporation in this sequel.(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
The Darkness: Shadows and Light
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial groundHe takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force.(n)

programme.title: Truth or Dare
Truth or Dare?
programme.desc: A seemingly innocent game of truth or dare turns deadly when someone - or something - begins punishing those who refuse to play fair.(n)

programme.title: Butterfly Effect 3
programme.desc: A young man with the ability to travel back and forth in time unwittingly unleashes a serial killer when he tries to solve the mystery of his high-school girlfriend's deathChris Carmack stars in this chilling new chapter to the hit horror franchiseDirected by Seth Grossman.(n)

programme.title: Red Sparrow
programme.desc: In this unsettling thriller, a Russian ballerina is recruited for a brutal training regime for spies known as "Sparrows." She is assigned to seduce a CIA officer, but is soon tempted to turn double agent and strike back against her cruel handlers.(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: A throwback to the horror films of the '70s, this inventive, well-crafted chiller follows a group of college friends who are threatened by a flesh-eating disease in the woods.(n)

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, a reporter tries to start a new life in Oregon with her son, but can't escape the vengeful spirit and evil videotape that terrorized her in SeattleNaomi Watts reprises her role under the stylish direction of Hideo Nakata, who also made the two original Japanese "Ring" moviesSimon Baker, David Dorfman, Elizabeth Perkins.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: After returning to duty, a haunted police officer finds evidence that incriminates several of his colleagues in this gritty, action-packed thrillerAs a result, the corrupt cops attempt to silence him in order to save their careers.(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a failed heist is forced by the police to piece together events leading up to the deaths of his partnersMeanwhile, the motivations of the enigmatic criminal mastermind who planned the job remain a mystery.(n)

programme.title: Warning Sign
programme.desc: In this thriller, workers at the Bio Tek Agronomics company believe that they are helping to develop a new strain of grainHowever, they are unaware the company is actually engaged in the development of biological warfare until an accident sets a deadly virus loose in the small Utah town.(n)

programme.title: The Skulls II
programme.desc: Selected for an elite, clandestine college society, Ryan is determined to pass the entrance tests, despite the objections of his girlfriend AliBut when Ryan witnesses a murder, he realises that this lethal fraternity rarely discloses its secrets.(n)

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Rob Bowman's fantasy thriller stars Jennifer Garner as Elektra, an assassin tutored by the mysterious martial arts master StickHer latest assignment is to keep Mark Miller and his daughter Abby safe from the ninja warriors of the evil Order of the Hand, to whom she once paid allegianceNow that she is on the side of good, her task is to protect those who can tip the balance between good and evil, but can she overcome her once-fellow assassins?(n)

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: One of the books in Jo Nesbo's Harry Hole detective series is adapted for the big screen that follows detective Harry Hole who investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found on a snowman.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: In 2049 L.A., a cop known as K hunts down android labourers who have gone rogueBut when he uncovers a shocking conspiracy involving the robots, K searches for the one person who might have answers: a law-enforcement agent who once had his job.(n)

programme.title: The Forest

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A bounty hunter must fight to stay alive as he plays a deadly game, created by a wealthy and evil mastermind, in which he must hunt down his opponents before they are able kill him.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: In 1964 San Francisco, a pre-fame Bruce Lee challenges a Shaolin monk named Wong Jack Man to a fight behind closed doorsThis engaging drama depicts this real-life event, which helped cement Lee's reputation as a legendary martial artist.(n)

programme.title: We Love Moses
programme.desc: An 18-year-old woman reflects on her obsession with her brother's best friend, Moses, when she was younger and how it left her with a secret she still carries.(n)

programme.title: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on EarthThe two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescueHowever, living on Earth starts to have a devastating effect on the visitor's health, while a government operative is determined to capture him for study.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Aided and abetted by the eccentric Doc Brown, Marty McFly travels both forward and backwards through the decades to thwart the actions of arch-rival Biff Tannen.(n)

programme.title: Bad Girls
programme.desc: Wild West hooker Cody is sentenced to hang for killing an abusive customer of her pal AnitaBut three friends come to her aid, whisking her off the gallows and onto the road to Texas.(n)

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: Martial artist Tang decides to help his relatives who are being forced to sell their restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Martha finally finds her MrRight, but he has just one flaw: he is a hitman on the run from his former employers, a crime cartel.(n)

programme.title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
programme.desc: Smilla Jaspersen, a Greenlander, lives in CopenhagenA young boy falls to his death from the roof of her apartment building; his death is ruled an accident, yet Smilla, an expert on ice and snow, can tell from his footprints that he was running from someoneSmilla begins her own investigation, forming an uneasy friendship (and perhaps a romance) with her neighbor, a mechanicSmilla uncovers a trail of clues, leading her towards a secretive corporation that has made several mysterious expeditions to GreenlandWhat are they looking for? Were they somehow responsible for the boy's death? We'll find the answer on Gela Alta, a frozen island off Greenland's western coast.(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A successful bank robber manages to escape from jailOutside he becomes involved with the Federal Marshal assigned the task of recapturing him...(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Gritty dramaMick O'Brien, a teenager from Chicago, must face the ultimate consequence when he is linked to the death of a rival gang member's younger brother.(n)

programme.title: The Quiet American
programme.desc: Michael Caine was nominated for an Oscar for his performance in this outstanding adaptation of Graham Greene's novelCaine plays a cynical British journalist in 1952 Vietnam who befriends an American aid worker, unaware that he's really a CIA agentBrendan Fraser is also excellent as the seemingly naive Yank who falls in love with Caine's young Vietnamese mistress.(n)

programme.title: Mobsters
programme.desc: Set against the background of 1920s America, four young men - Charlie Luciano, Meyer Lansky, Benny Siegel and Frank Costello - forge a bond of loyalty and friendship which will help them in their rise to the top of the organised criminal underworldHowever, they will have to deal with the two established Mob bosses first.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Luego de acceder a que su hija se case con el enfermero Greg Focker, el ex agente de la CIA Jack Byrnes y su esposa viajan a Miami para conocer a los padres de Greg, esta vez el señor y la señora Focker, que son totalmente opuestos a los ByrnesComo se p.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Frank Oz's remake of the 1975 thriller is a pointed black comedy with a sublime A-list castNicole Kidman stars as a former TV exec who suspects something is amiss when all of her new neighbors seem programmed to please their husbandsMatthew Broderick costars as her Milquetoast husbandBette Midler, Faith Hill, Glenn Close, Christopher Walken, Jon Lovitz.(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When an amateur hockey team from Mystery, Alaska accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the centre of a nationally televised event.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: Six high school students all have their different reasons for stealing the SAT exam papersBut pulling the heist will need teamworkComedy.(n)

programme.title: Pirate Radio
programme.desc: Eccentric 60s' DJs run a rock 'n' roll radio station from a boat on the North SeaAs stuffy government ministers try to close them down, the boss's godson comes aboard for a life-changing adventureComedy.(n)

programme.title: June
programme.desc: An immigrant Chinese wife joins her husband in 1950s America after he graduates from college.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Eli
programme.desc: Eli roams a postapocalyptic world, protecting a sacred tome that offers guidance on how to rebuild humanityThe evil Carnegie goes to great lengths to acquire the powerful book, but Carnegie's adopted daughter, who wants to escape her father's clutches, helps Eli.(n)

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A veteran diver is enlisted to save a submarine that was attacked by the world's largest sharkWith the help of an eminent Chinese oceanographer and his daughter, he works against the clock and a prehistoric monster to rescue the crew from the world's deepest trench.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus, son of Zeus, gets dragged into the war between gods when his family is taken by the evil god HadesHe gathers a group of warriors and together they battle mythical creatures and seek to rescue his family and save earth from turning into a living hell at the hands of Hades.(n)

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: Four ecology students face an impossible task after a deadly parasite is unleashed and they must either run for their lives or sacrifice themselves for the sake of humanity.(n)

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: An American nurse based in Tokyo finds work caring for an elderly psychotic woman at her homeHowever, she discovers the house is under a curse going back generations, which leads all who enter to be consumed by a powerful rage before dying, leaving troubled spirits to claim other victims.(n)

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key
programme.desc: In the fourth instalment in the "Insidious" series, parapsychologist Elise Rainier must delve even deeper into the infernal world known as "the Further" when supernatural forces target her own family.(n)

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: Supernatural horrorEighteen years after her unexplained death, the former students of a sadistic nun are terrorised by a murderous ghostly apparition.(n)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: A young boy accidentally triggers the return of Predators to Earth, only now they are even stronger and more lethal after genetically upgrading themselves with DNA from other species in the universeIt's up to a ragtag group of ex-soldiers to stop them, along with unexpected help from a disgruntled science teacher.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of the Jurassic World park, Owen Grady and Claire Dearing return to Isla Nublar to save the remaining dinosaurs from a soon-to-erupt volcanoBut their efforts are curbed by a conspiracy that could result in dinosaurs ruling the Earth once more.(n)

programme.title: The Ladykillers
programme.desc: A gang of thieves poses as a band to plot a riverboat heist, but their elderly landlady catches onWhen she refuses to accept a share of the take in exchange for her silence, the thieves decide the best solution is to silence her permanently.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: John Milius's jingoistic direction and pulpy screenplay fit perfectly into this film version of the Robert EHoward fantasy story of the sword and sorcery hero, Conan the BarbarianComplementing Mulius's heavy metal production is Arnold Schwarzenegger's leaden acting, which in any other context would be deadly, but here (as in The Terminator) corresponds nicely with the whole sonorous projectThe story begins when a horde of rampaging warriors massacre the parents of young Conan and enslave the young child for years on The Wheel of PainThe Wheel of Pain seems to have as its only purpose the building up of Conan's muscles, so it's no surprise that one day Conan grows up to become Arnold SchwarzeneggerAs the sole survivor of the childhood massacre, Conan is released from slavery and taught the ancient arts of fightingTransforming himself into a killing machine, Conan travels into the wilderness to seek vengeance on Thulsa Doom (James Earl Jones), the man responsible for killing his familyIn the wilderness, Conan takes up with the thieves Valeria (Sandahl Bergman) and Subota (Gerry Lopez)The trio comes upon a weird snake cult, linked to Doom, and Conan wants to trek off to Doom's mountain retreat to kill himBut he is prevented from doing that by King Osrik (Max Von Sydow), who wants the trio of warriors to help rescue his daughter who has joined Doom in the hills.(n)

programme.title: Light It Up
programme.desc: An ensemble cast of young actors highlights this gripping drama about a standoff between students and police at an inner-city high schoolThe barricades are put in place after an accident involving a school security officer (Forest Whitaker)Judd Nelson, Usher Raymond, Sara Gilbert, Rosario Dawson, Robert Ri'chard, Vanessa LWilliams.(n)

programme.title: Stay Alive
programme.desc: A group of friends tries to stay alive while solving the mystery of an underground video game that results in its players being brutally murdered in the same ways that their characters are killed in the gameJon Foster stars in this riveting cyber-thrillerFrankie Muniz, Samaire Armstrong, Sophia BushDirected by William Brent Bell.(n)

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Thriller about an American truck driver in Iraq who is kidnapped and buried aliveWith nothing but a lighter, mobile phone and flashlight he has to try to get himself out.(n)

programme.title: Courage Under Fire
programme.desc: Set during the Gulf War, this story begins with LtColSerling accidentally destroying one of his own tanks and being demotedMeanwhile CaptWalden dies during conflictThe Government wants to give a medal to Walden, and it is up to Serling to find out if she deserves it.(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Kingdom Of Heaven
programme.desc: A blacksmith joins the Crusades and tries to achieve peace between Muslims and ChristiansMeanwhile, violent agitators on both sides foolishly strive to end the peace in a bid for greater power.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Academy Award-winner Russell Crowe stars as the legendary figure of 13th century England, who along with his band of marauders confront corruption in the local village of Nottingham and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world powerWhether regarded as thief or hero, one man from humble beginnings will become an eternal symbol of freedom for his peopleDirected by Academy Award-nominee Ridley Scott and co-starring Academy Award-winner Cate Blanchett, this is a captivating re-imagining of the popular mythology that has inspired generation after generation of adventurers.(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Minds
programme.desc: In a future where teenagers have developed strange new powers, 16-year-old Ruby finds herself sent to a government detainment campRuby has to work together with a group of likeminded teens in order to escape the camp and protect their future from those who hate and fear them.(n)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Marooned on an alien planet, a group of mercenaries, assassins and murderers must work together to avoid being picked off by the deadly aliens that hunt them.(n)

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: Director Steven Soderbergh and screenwriter Stephen Gaghan's masterly drama follows three interconnected stories set in the deadly world of drug trafficking.(n)

programme.title: My Little Eye
programme.desc: Horror in which five young people agree to live in a remote house for six months with their every move filmed by numerous cameras in order for them to win a prize of $1millionThe stipulations of their incarceration are that nobody leaves the house and that they all adhere to a strict curfew, but when strange things start to happen, the group begin to wonder if all is as it seems.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A US Fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.(n)

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In the near future, a company called The Union provides expensive prosthesis to improve human livesThe dark side of this medical breakthrough, though, is that if you don't pay your bill, The Union sends highly skilled repo men to take back its propertyFormer soldier Remy is one of the best organ repo men in the businessBut when he fails to keep up on payments for his recent heart transplant, his former partner vows to take back the organ by force if necessaryRemy finds an unexpected ally in the form of his long-lost wife, Beth, who has also been retrofitted with numerous artificial organs.(n)

programme.title: Collision
programme.desc: A married couple (Frank Grillo and Jamie Alexander) end up in a dangerous situation in the Sahara Desert after they are involved in a serious car accident that kills a manWritten and directed by David Marconi.(n)

programme.title: Darkman III: Die Darkman Die
Darkman 3: Die Darkman Die
programme.desc: DrWestlake/Darkman (Arnold Vosloo) is up to his old tricks, stealing from the bad and keeping for himself while still trying to perfect his synthetic skin which only lasts 99 minutes in the lightAfter stealing from industrialist and mobster/drug dealer Peter Rooker (Jeff Fahey), Westlake is approached by DrBridget Thorne (Darlanne Fluegel) who is engaged to perform an operation to relieve his pain, but instead she implants in his brain a special device that enables his enemies to control him by inducing unbearable painWith the help of double-crossing DrThorne, Rooker wants to create a new drug based on Darkman's researchBut Darkman strikes back by infiltrating Rooker's gang and his lifeDarkman even starts to feel drawn to Rooker's wife Angela (Roxann Biggs-Dawson) and her daughter, who are neglected by the real RookerBut in disguise, Darkman is able to cling to a normal life, posing as a family manEven though this sequel was filmed before Darkman II: The Return of Durant, it was ultimately decided that it should be bumped back to part threeThis direct-to-video sequel is however, in many ways, superior to the first sequelFahey makes an excellent villain combining the best of what made Larry Drake and Colin Friels so enjoyable in the originalVosloo still can't capture the essence and power of Liam Neeson's character portrayal, but he does a good enough jobFans of the saga will go feverish over this sequel and others with find it fun as well.(n)

programme.title: MacGruber
programme.desc: Will Forte, Kristen Wiig and Val Kilmer star in this violent, risqué action-movie spoofIt's an extended spin-off of a regular Saturday Night Live sketch that in turn pastiches the 1980s TV action series MacGyverOur bumbling 'hero' is the bemulleted former special ops agent MacGruber, who has a sartorial taste all of his own (thankfully) and a general aversion to using weapons (though this doesn't extend to his allies)Having to all purposes retired, he's dragged unwillingly from seclusion to thwart the dastardly Dieter von Cunth, a terrorist who has got his hands on a nuclear missileBut saving the world isn't MacGruber's main reason for taking on the mission: he has unfinished business with von Cunth, who was responsible for the death of his girlfriend; and he's also keen to work again with the foxy Vicki St Elmo.(n)

programme.title: Against the Ropes
Against The Ropes
programme.desc: (2004) Charles SDutton's loosely fact-based film stars Meg Ryan as Jackie Kallen, America's most famous female boxing promotera lowly PA to the owner of the Cleveland Coliseum, a prime boxing venue, Kallen gets into an argument with promoter Sam LaRocca (Tony Shalhoub), who laughingly offers her the contract of one of his fightersThe boxer in question is crack-addicted Devon Greene (Tony Kittles), but fate intervenes in the shape (and muscle) of debt collector Luther Shaw (Omar Epps), who's after the money Greene owesSeeing Shaw's potential, Kallen persuades him to sign upBut, after a few wins, he attracts the attention of her rival male promoters, and she begins to believe a little too much in her own pressThis intriguing, overlooked movie stands out because of its honesty, with the Kallen figure portrayed as no paragon of virtue in one of sport's murkiest worldsM,W,R,HD.(n)

programme.title: Traffik
programme.desc: A couple head off for a romantic weekend in the mountainsIsolated at a remote estate, they are surprised by the arrival of two friends, but just when the weekend starts to get back on track, a violent biker gang turns up and begins to torment them.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Anastasia Steele and Christian Grey are eager to begin their lives as husband and wife, and Christian even purchases a lavish home to make a fresh startHowever, they soon find themselves facing both new temptations and threats from the past.(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: Chief Warrant Officer Roy Miller deals with booby traps and cover-ups while searching for weapons of mass destruction in Iraq during the US occupation in 2003.(n)

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: 1970s-era DC antihero Jonah Hex makes his way to the big screen as co-screenwriters Mark Neveldine and Brian Taylor (Crank, Gamer) team to follow the disfigured gunslinger and part-time bounty hunter on his biggest adventure yetSupernatural elements combine with Western aesthetics to take viewers on a wild and bloody ride, with Josh Brolin leading the way as Hex and John Malkovich stepping into the villainous role of TurnbullJimmy Hayward (Horton Hears a Who) directs.(n)

programme.title: Déjà vu
programme.desc: Port Authority cop Doug Carlin travels back in time to save the key witness in the investigation into a ferry bombingThriller.(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: After Batman Begins, director Christopher Nolan and star Christian Bale work together once again, in this mystery thriller set in nineteenth century LondonMagician Robert Angier (Hugh Jackman) lost his beloved wife accidentally during a performanceHe blames his friend, also magician Alfred Borden for her death and they become enemiesTheir intense rivalry will lead to a life-long battle for supremacy, with deadly consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: A young boy accidentally triggers the return of Predators to Earth, only now they are even stronger and more lethal after genetically upgrading themselves with DNA from other species in the universeIt's up to a ragtag group of ex-soldiers to stop them, along with unexpected help from a disgruntled science teacher.(n)

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: After criminals blow up his lab and leave him for dead, a brilliant—but now terribly scarred—scientist exacts his revengeUsing synthetic skin he developed, he is able to assume the identities of many of the gang's key players.(n)

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules
programme.desc: A former magazine editor writes a relationship guide for men after his fiancée leaves him.(n)

programme.title: Uncle Drew
programme.desc: A young black man recruits a crew of septuagenarians for the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem after losing his original line-up to his arch-rivalThis anti-ageist basketball comedy features performances from six real-life NBA legends in geriatric makeovers.(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Chalk 'n' cheese sisters Cameron Diaz and Toni Collette fall out over a manCan long-lost gran Shirley MacLaine bring them back together? Comedy dramaSexual references.(n)

programme.title: Hbo First Look: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: An in-depth preview of the third installment in the "John Wick" action series.(n)

programme.title: Hulk
The Hulk
programme.desc: A genetically mutated scientist's alter ego runs amok in this adaptation of the Marvel comic.(n)

programme.title: Twisted
programme.desc: Philip Kaufman directs the detective thriller Twisted (originally to be titled The Blackout Murders), with a script by up-and-coming filmmaker Sarah ThorpAshley Judd plays troubled police detective Jessica Shepard, who works under the jurisdiction of the man who raised her as his daughter, police Commissioner Mills (Samuel LJackson)While investigating a serial murder case, Jessica -- who is has a proclivity for dangerous, drunken one-night-stands -- discovers that all of the victims are men whom she's recently beddedComplicating matters are her bitter ex-boyfriend (Mark Pellegrino), her very curious therapist (David Strathairn), and her odd-behaving new partner Mike Delmarco (Andy Garcia).(n)

programme.title: Darkman II: The Return of Durant
programme.desc: Dr Peyton Westlake, alias the crime-fighting master of disguise Darkman, is still trying to find a way of healing his disfigured featuresBut a tragic turn of events causes him to re-live the nightmare that disfigured him...(n)

programme.title: Confidence
programme.desc: (2003) James Foley's slick thriller is told in flashback by Jake Vig (Edward Burns) who, with his team, pulls off a scam against accountant Lionel Dolby (Leland Orser)Unfortunately, Dolby happens to do the books for unstable mob boss Winston King (Dustin Hoffman), and the only way out is to pull off a bigger and more dangerous scam against King's rivals.(n)

programme.title: A Fantastic Fear of Everything
programme.desc: An apprehensive crime novelist gets the opportunity of a lifetime, but finds his one shot at success hampered by his soul-crushing paranoia in this comedy starring Simon Pegg (Star Trek, Shaun of the Dead)Jack (Pegg) used to write children's books, but lately he's begun to dabble in the dark world of crime writingThere's only one problem: the more Jack reads about Victorian-era serial killers, the more he begins to fear he will be murdered at any momentIrrational as this fear may be, Jack attempts to keep his cool when his agent contacts him with news that an enigmatic Hollywood executive has been inquiring about his latest scriptMeanwhile, in order to break out of his downward spiral, he must first contend with his fears of laundry, women, and the black cloud of dread that lingers over his head.(n)

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: As alien beings threaten Earth's cities, former preacher Graham Hess and his family retreat into their farmhouse and prepare for a very close encounter.(n)

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key
programme.desc: In the fourth instalment in the "Insidious" series, parapsychologist Elise Rainier must delve even deeper into the infernal world known as "the Further" when supernatural forces target her own family.(n)

programme.title: My Friend Dahmer
programme.desc: This biopic of the infamous serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer (Ross Lynch) takes place during his senior year in high school, as his inner demons are beginning to manifest and his mental illness is becoming apparentThe film is based on the real-life experiences of Derf Backderf, a friend and classmate of Dahmer's who wrote the graphic novel My Friend DahmerWritten and directed by Marc Meyers, and co-starring Anne Heche, Dallas Roberts, Alex Wolff, and Vincent Kartheiser.(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: A girl struggling with her sexual identity dresses as a boy and moves to a new townEverything goes well for her until her identity is uncovered, prompting a tragic chain of events.(n)

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: An intern is forced to follow rowdy rock star Aldous Snow on a trip from London to a concert in Los Angeles meant to revive his stalled career.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Help Us
programme.desc: Touching, funny and dramatic about youth, rebellion, friendship and self discoverySet in a 1960s Brooklyn all boys Catholic school, Andrew McCarthy is the new student trying to adapt to life after the death of his parents.(n)

programme.title: Love Potion No. 9
programme.desc: When it comes to love, Paul Matthews and Diane Farrow, two highly educated and talented scientists don't know a thingLooking at their geeky demeanor's it's easy to see whyDespite the fact that both are neighbors, share the same interests and both are psychobiologists who study primates, neither is really aware of the other romantically until Paul, who is terribly shy around women, goes to gypsy Madame Ruth in desperation and asks for helpShe reads his palm and tells him that he needs a woman; she then hands him Love Potion No8 which will attract women like flies to honeyThis romantic comedy chronicles what happens to him (and Diane) when, after experimenting on animals, they decide to try it on themselvesThough the changes only last four hours per dose, they are truly remarkable and the two agree to separate for three weeks and then come back together to compare resultsThe time passes quickly and wonderfully for them and when they finally reunite both have changed for the betterJust for fun, they decide to go out with each otherThey do not drink the potion, but still have a wonderful and passionate nightThis leads Paul to propose to DianeUnfortunately, she thinks she loves another, a man who is really more interested in exploiting the potion for money than he is in herHe ends up buying up all of Madame Ruth's latest batchPaul goes back to her and explains his problem and that is when Ruth hands him the potent Love Potion No9, which can manifest true loveQuickly, he takes it and sets off to find Diane before she makes a terrible mistake.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: Mum Tess and daughter Anna swap bodies after eating magic fortune cookiesAnna struggles with her mum's marriage plans, while Tess is dealing with boys all over againFamily comedy.(n)

programme.title: Dave
programme.desc: Warmhearted comedy about regular guy Dave Kovic - a dead ringer for the American president - who is asked to stand in for the leader when he is taken illWhen the President has a stroke, Dave's temporary assignment is extended indefinitelySettling into the role, he transforms the President's image, and wins over the First Lady and, gradually, the nationBut the chief of staff is plotting against him, threatening exposure.(n)

programme.title: Just Wright
programme.desc: When NBA All-Star Scott McKnight (Common) suffers a debilitating injury, tough-talking physical therapist Leslie Wright (Queen Latifah) pulls out all the stops to get him back on his gameBut their professional relationship turns personal when Leslie finds herself falling for Scott, and discovers the feeling may be mutualPaula Patton co-stars in a romantic comedy penned by Michael Elliot and directed by Sanaa Hamri.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director implores a call girl to turn her life around while the star of his latest production makes a play for his wife in this ensemble comedy.(n)

programme.title: One Night Stand
programme.desc: Jemaine Clement and Bret McKenzie perform as Flight of the Conchords, a folk-music-parody duo from New Zealand. Taped in New York City at the Jack H. Skirball Center for the Performing Arts.(n)

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a hilarious race against time in this comedy, in which three groomsmen awaken after a night of debauchery to learn that the groom is missing, and they must find him before the wedding bells chimeWith no memory of the previous night's transgressions and precious little time to spare, the trio retrace their steps and discover where things went wrong.(n)

programme.title: Indian Summer
programme.desc: Seven friends reunite for a week-long reunion at a summer camp in Ontario they used to attend as children which is now threatened with being closed down.(n)

programme.title: BlacKkKlansman
programme.desc: Spike Lee brings to life the incredible true story of an African-American cop who bravely infiltrated the Ku Klux Klan on a mission to take them downOscar-winning drama(2018)(135 mins).(n)

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When Rachel's boyfriend Nick asks her to travel back to Singapore with him for a friend's wedding, she has no idea what she's in forAfter learning that Nick comes from one of the country's wealthiest families, Rachel realises she's involved with one of Asia's most eligible bachelors, and she's going to have to fight to keep ahold of him.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director implores a call girl to turn her life around while the star of his latest production makes a play for his wife in this ensemble comedy.(n)

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a hilarious race against time in this comedy, in which three groomsmen awaken after a night of debauchery to learn that the groom is missing, and they must find him before the wedding bells chimeWith no memory of the previous night's transgressions and precious little time to spare, the trio retrace their steps and discover where things went wrong.(n)

programme.title: The Guru
programme.desc: Dance instructor, Ramu Gupta, leaves India for America in search of fame and fortuneHe arranges to stay with his rich and successful cousin in New York, but when he arrives, Ramu realises that his cousin was lying about his wealth and he lives in a squalid flat above a shopWith no cash to fall back on Ramu finds himself working as a waiter in an Indian restaurant and he attends every audition goingDue to a bizarre mix up Ramu is mistaken for a spiritual leader - 'The Guru of Sex'.(n)

programme.title: Weekend at Bernie's
programme.desc: Crazy farce about a pair of teenage boys who jump at the chance of spending a weekend at their boss's beach houseFinding him dead on their arrival, the victim of an organised crime plot, the boys determine not to let the corpse spoil their plans of a fun-filled vacation and cart it around with them, giving it a life-like appearance through a number of ingenious and hilarious tricks.(n)

programme.title: Annie Hall
programme.desc: Rogue lobsters, spiders "as big as a Buick" and a romance that blossoms in the Manhattan springWith its irresistible brand of bittersweet comedy, the story of stand-up comic Alvy Singer and his nervy wooing of free-spirited Annie Hall won Best Picture in 1977.(n)

programme.title: Big Business
programme.desc: In Big Business, two sets of twins get mixed up at birth and end up leading vastly different livesUltimately, they come together once again when they are on opposite sides in the takeover battle of a small-town company.(n)

programme.title: Son-in-Law
programme.desc: Meaning to thwart the advances of a hometown boy, a college student takes her California surfer roomie to her Midwestern home for Thanksgiving and passes him off as her husband-to-beAfter a few complications, the visiting couple falls for each other, the family finally accepts him and the suitor-hopeful is no longer a threatPauly Shore and Carla Gugino star in this light comedy.(n)

programme.desc: Comedy in which a well-meaning teacher finds himself in jail after accidentally killing a police horseNow he must rely on his permanently-stoned roommates to raise the $100,000 bail money to facilitate his release!(n)

programme.title: A Low Down Dirty Shame
programme.desc: PI Andre Shame becomes embroiled in a web of danger while searching for a fortune in missing drug money.(n)

programme.title: Head over Heels
Head Over Heels
programme.desc: If you think you've seen a man killing someone, does that mean you shouldn't be dating him? This and other questions about modern relationships are explored in this offbeat romantic comedyAmanda Pierce (Monica Potter) has found a great job (restoring paintings for the Metropolitan Museum of Art) and a great place to live: a spacious East Side apartment that she shares with four successful models, played by Ivana Milicevic, Shalom Harlow, Sarah O'Hare, and Tomiko FraserAmanda is still in the market for a great boyfriend, since most of her previous relationships have ended in broken promises or infidelityShe thinks she may have found the right guy in Jim Winston (Freddie Prinze Jr.), but she has reason to believe that he might be guilty of murderSince she's not sure he has actually done anything, she decides to find out the truth, and her investigation has unexpectedly comic consequencesHead Over Heels was directed by Mark SWaters, whose first feature, The House of Yes, also starred Freddie Prinze Jr..(n)

programme.title: Amelie
programme.desc: Nominated for five Oscars, this delightful French comedy employs imaginative cinematic tricks to tell the story of a painfully shy Parisian waitress (Audrey Tautou) who secretly does good deeds for others, yet is afraid to accept love in her own lifeMathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Yolande Moreau.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Frank Oz's remake of the 1975 thriller is a pointed black comedy with a sublime A-list castNicole Kidman stars as a former TV exec who suspects something is amiss when all of her new neighbors seem programmed to please their husbandsMatthew Broderick costars as her Milquetoast husbandBette Midler, Faith Hill, Glenn Close, Christopher Walken, Jon Lovitz.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Fockers

programme.title: Pirate Radio
programme.desc: Eccentric 60s' DJs run a rock 'n' roll radio station from a boat on the North SeaAs stuffy government ministers try to close them down, the boss's godson comes aboard for a life-changing adventureComedy.(n)

programme.title: Mischief
programme.desc: This entertaining teen comedy is set in the effervescent 1950s and involves the friendship of the introverted, clumsy Jonathan (Doug McKeon) and the nonconformist, extroverted Gene (Chris Nash)Jonathan's main objective is to win over the sexy Marilyn (Kelly Preston), in spite of his shyness, while Gene has his own love-life to maintain with his girlfriend Bunny (Catherine Mary Stewart) -- as well as counseling Jonathan on how to attract womenGene also has to defend himself against Kenny (D.WBrown) the class bully while trying to work out a borderline relationship with his widowed father, who has zero tolerance for his often wild escapadesAs Jonathan and Gene handle life's challenges, the 1950s emerges as a potent presence on screen in the form of background setting, including movies and music, as well as dress and customs that were popular in that distinctive era.(n)

programme.title: Rosie O'Donnell: A Heartfelt Stand Up
programme.desc: Rosie O'Donnell performs at Levity Live Comedy Club in West Nyack, N.Y., where she talks about her 2012 heart attack; her wife, Michelle; her children; and her lifelong infatuation with Barbra Streisand.(n)

programme.title: My Father, the Hero
My Father The Hero
programme.desc: Divorced father Andre takes Nicole, his 14 year-old daughter, to the Bahamas for a vacationNicole is eager to be seen not as a girl, but a woman, and makes up stories to impress a local boy, including that her dad is really her loverRemake of the French comedy "Mon père, ce héros.".(n)

programme.title: The Layover

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: Childhood friends Jerry (Jeremy Renner), Callahan (Jon Hamm), Randy (Jake Johnson), Sable (Hannibal Buress) and Hoagie (Ed Helms) have been competing in the same game of tag for 30 yearsWhen Jerry gets married, he attempts to retire from the intense annual game without ever being "it," causing the other four to band together and go to extreme lengths to finally tag himDirected by Jeff TomsicInspired by the Wall Street Journal article "It Takes Planning, Caution to Avoid Being It." Isla Fisher, Annabelle Wallis, Rashida Jones, Leslie Bibb and Nora Dunn co-star.(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: Ben Foster stars in this teenage comedy as Berke Landers, an average high schooler who has achieved high status by winning over Allison (Melissa Sagemiller), reputed to be the most popular and beautiful girl in his classAfter an initially winning time, Allison finds herself drawn to the hot new guy in school, leaving Berke in the lurchAt the risk of ruining his unsteady reputation, Berke concocts a scheme for getting Allison back: he will join the school production of +A Midsummer Night's Dream and prove his romanticism to herRealizing he needs an effective acting coach, he turns to Kelly (Kirsten Dunst), who was once the annoying little sister of a best friend and has suddenly blossomed into a grownup -- to whom Berke finds himself drawnBerke must then decide if getting Allison back is the ultimate priority, as he falls for the more sensible Kelly, all while trying to maintain a credible presence both in school and in his new acting gigGet Over It also features R&B singer Sisqo, comedian Martin Short, and Shane West in supporting roles.(n)

programme.title: Jack Goes Boating
programme.desc: Adapted from Bob Glaudini's play of the same name, Philip Seymour Hoffman's directorial debut, Jack Goes Boating, tells the simple tale of Jack (Hoffman), a shy, fortyish limo driver with a fondness for pot and reggae music -- he likes it because it sounds happy -- who meets Connie (Amy Ryan) for a blind date set up by Connie's co-worker Lucy (Daphne Rubin-Vega), who is married to Jack's best friend and fellow limo driver, Clyde (John Ortiz)As the young couple tentatively come together, breaking through layers and layers of awkwardness and low self-esteem, Clyde and Lucy's marriage begins to dissolve because of Clyde's inability to get over an incident from their pastAll the while, Clyde gives Jack swimming lessons so that he can take Connie on her dream date -- a boating trip on the lake.(n)

programme.title: The Ref
programme.desc: When a cat burglar is ditched by his partner in the middle of a break-in, he takes a bickering Connecticut couple hostageSeeking to get out of the situation alive, and out of handcuffs, the burglar acts as referee to sort out their family problems.(n)

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: After their mother passes away, four estranged siblings return home to attend the traditional funeral she wanted.(n)

programme.title: Waking Ned Devine
programme.desc: Just as the charming British film The Full Monty told the story of simple men willing to shed their clothes for money, Waking Ned Devine is the story of older Irish men who pursue money and take off their clothesCommercial director Kirk Jones makes his feature directing debut with a story about a small town in Ireland called Tulaigh More, where one of their 52 inhabitants wins the lotto jackpot of nearly seven million poundsWhen nobody claims it, the town goes on a search to find out whyThey find the winner, old Ned Devine, dead -- a smile on his face, clutching the winning ticketWell, in Ireland, the lottery winnings must be claimed by the purchaser, which puts the town in a spot -- if the lottery officials discover Devine dead, he forfeits his moneyWhat ensues is a community coming together in hopes of getting his money to split 51 waysWhat they learn is the importance of friendship and the true value of moneyTo reveal any more would spoil some major surprises, but suffice it to say, it involves aging actors David Kelly, 69, and Ian Bannen, 70, naked.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: When the mother of a sniveling group of surly kids goes on a much-deserved summer vacation, she leaves her kids under the charge of an elderly distaff grannyBut then granny has a heart attack, so the kids load her dead body in a trunk and deposit the package on the steps of the local funeral homeThe kids are ecstatic thinking that with the big wad of cash Mom has left, they can have a summer of consumer madnessBut when they find out that the money has been buried with the baby-sitter, the kids have to fend for themselves to make ends meetTeen dream Sue Ellen (Christina Applegate) tries working at a fast food restaurant but she can't stand the greaseSo, she puts together a false resume and, posing as a twenty-eight-year old, she applies for a job as a receptionist at a garment manufacturing companyThe company vice president, Rose is so impressed by her resume that she hires her on the spot as her executive assistantHer deception looks to be working out great -- Sue Ellen manages to hold off the office lady killer, avoids exposure by the embittered receptionist, borrows money from the company's petty cash box for household incidentals, and continues her relationship with restaurant employee Bryan (Josh Charles)But suddenly, the clothing firm is set to go under, and Sue Ellen must use her teen fashion sense to save the company and her job and she has to get the rest of the brood involvedWatch out for a young David Duchovny in a small role.(n)

programme.title: Chronicle Mysteries: Vines That Bind
programme.desc: In the next installment of Chronicle Mysteries, podcaster Alex McPherson travels to a vineyard to investigate the suspicious death of a winemakerMeanwhile, her partner Drew explores corporate buyouts surrounding the vineyard's Pennsylvania townAs their investigations begin to align, the two find themselves questioning whether or not the vineyard tragedy and the town's mysterious changes are intertwined.(n)

programme.title: Ruby Herring Mysteries: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Consumer news reporter Ruby Herring stumbles onto a murder, and the intrepid redhead inadvertently discovers a knack for crime solvingWith the reluctant help of a handsome detective, Ruby finds a new career covering crime.(n)

programme.title: Mystery 101
programme.desc: English professor Amy uses her crime fiction expertise to unravel the case of a murdered college student faster than detective Travis, who ends up working with Amy to catch the killer.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: The rivalry between sailing captains competing for a trophy leads to a death.(n)

programme.sub-title: What You Don't Know Can Kill You

programme.title: Hart to Hart

programme.title: Hart to Hart
programme.desc: A chef is murdered before he can show Jonathan a fantastic discovery. Stefanie Powers, Lionel Stander. Pauline: Corinne Calvet. Maurice: Jacques Aubuchon. programme.desc: A big spender looks greedily at his sister-in-law's legacy from the husband she shot to death. Blair: Amanda McBroom. Jonathan: Robert Wagner. Margaret: Belinda Mayne. Jennifer: Stefanie Powers. David: Thomas Callaway. Darryl: Doug Rowe. Lt. Beckerman: Floyd Levine. Tony Trabert: Himself.(n)

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The detective series departs from tradition. For once, the audience don't know the criminal from the start, so we're in the same boat as Columbo as he pieces together clues from the kidnapping of a cop's bride. Columbo attends his nephew's wedding and as the couple get ready to leave on their honeymoon, the bride disappears. Columbo investigates, thinking his nephew may have made a few enemies on the police force.(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the All-Star Assassin
programme.desc: Puzzler about a one-time hockey star charged with icing a team owner.(n)

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The apparent suicide of a piano student doesn't ring true to Matlock (Andy Griffith). Sandra Baldwin: Lisa Norman. Michael Baldwin: Andy Stahl. Russ Lewis: Leo Penn. Becky Smith: Kim Walker. Billy: Warren Frost. Matlock refuses to believe that a young piano player committed suicide, nor does the father of the girl who hires Matlock to find out what really happened.(n)

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The play's the thing when an actress in a theater production is murdered---and the director (Rene Auberjonois) is cast as the killer. Glenda: Deborah Winstead. Jane Dryden: Leslie Wing. Beth Samuels: Amy Parrish. Flora Michaels: Candy Aston. Matlock: Andy Griffith. Billy: Warren Frost. After an actress in The Last Cry of the Hounds is murdered, Matlock agrees to represent the director of a local community play - on the condition that the director not cut him from the play.(n)

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock recalls his first case: defending a cook (Stan Shaw) accused of murdering a sheriff (David Dwyer). Young Matlock: Steve Whitting. Sully: Dan Erickson. Martha: Beah Richards. Matlock: Andy Griffith. Matlock takes Leanne to meet Martha Jordan, the wife of his very first client back in 1962. Stan Shaw was the cook at the local diner when he was accused of killing the local sheriff after a disagreement in the diner. Charlie Matlock pushed his son, who had recently quit his job as a district attorney to take the case, but not everyone in town was happy with the Matlocks siding with the black cook accused of killing the white sheriff. Despite Cyrus Jordan's attempts to get the Matlocks to drop his case for their own safety, father and son were determined to prove that Cyrus never killed anyone..(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: A newsmagazine's story on Monk's probe of a serial killer brings the gang together for a viewing party, during which Monk senses something disturbing about the case.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Detective Adrian Monk used to have a minor case of obsessive-compulsive disorder. Then, the murder of his wife and his inability to solve the case exacerbated his condition...(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Detective Adrian Monk used to have a minor case of obsessive-compulsive disorder. Then, the murder of his wife and his inability to solve the case exacerbated his condition...(n)

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Juliet hires Gus to track down a former boyfriend, but Shawn discovers he is in a witness protection programme because he testified against a mobster in a murder trial.(n)

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: A lab loses one of its infectious agents, leaving Shawn and Gus to locate it before it can be unleashed on the public.(n)

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Shawn and Gus join a think tank designed to protect a tycoon from assassination plots. After the group disbands, they realize one of the members was using the meetings to plan an attack on the tycoon.(n)

programme.title: Psych
programme.sub-title: The Head, the Tail, the Whole Damn Episode
programme.desc: Lassiter suspects that a shark-attack victim was really murdered and asks Shawn and Gus to investigate. Jeri Ryan and Michael Hogan guest star.(n)

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Prescription for Murder
programme.desc: The CEO of Atlanta Memorial dies suddenly. The hospital staff is thrown for a loop. Hailey offers her help as a therapist to the grieving staff.(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: As she works on her annual book show for a San Francisco talk radio station striving to attract younger listeners, Jessica Fletcher is called on to investigate the murder of controversial radio presenter's manager.(n)

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: Returning servicemen face challenges.(n)

programme.title: Pride of the Marines
programme.desc: The story of Al Schmid, a true-life marine who served in World War IISchmid became a hero at Guadalcanal, defending a machine gun post and killing 200 Japanese before being permanently blinded by a grenadeDespite being awarded the Navy Cross, Schmid returns home embittered by his disabilityAfter convalescing, he is shaken back to life by his girlfriend and his best pal.(n)

programme.title: The Enchanted Cottage
programme.desc: Grab a box of hankies and curl up for a night of jerked tears and warm fuzzies with Enchanted Cottage, the romantic and melodramatic tale of a horribly disfigured WW II vet who finds love and renewal at the terribly plain, wallflowery hands of a young spinsterKnowing that society is incapable of appreciating the mutually regarded beauty within each of the lovers, they retire to the romantic seclusion of a lonely cottage in New EnglandThe plot is taken from a romantic play by Arthur Pineroi and was filmed before in the mid '20s.(n)

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A cabin cruiser is shipwrecked off the coast of a remote island and the three passengers manage to reach the island safelyThe island is owned by a strange and enigmatic Count who invites them to stayBut he has an underlying motive for his apparent generosityCount Zaroff enjoys hunting - and he only hunts The Most Dangerous Game - Man!(n)

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy is the Victorian scientist whose experiments with good and evil drive him to madness in this later adaptation of the Stevenson classic.(n)

programme.title: The Vampire Bat
Vampire Bat
programme.desc: Winged bloodsuckers who take human shape terrorize a small German village, where a disbelieving police inspector investigates and finds it hard to swallow a renowned scientist's hypothesis that murderous human bats may be responsible.(n)

programme.title: Mark of the Vampire
programme.desc: Tod Browning directed this remake of his 1927 silent thriller "London After Midnight," but moved the action to a remote Middle European village, where strange evils stalk the inhabitants and a police inspector teams with an occult expert to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Mad Love
programme.desc: In his first American film, Peter Lorre portrays egg-bald DrGogolA brilliant and highly respected surgeon, Gogol would give up everything he has in life for the love of Yvonne Orlac (Frances Drake), star of the Parisian Horror TheatreBut Yvonne is deeply in love with her husband, concert pianist Stephen Orlac (Colin Clive)When Orlac loses his hands in a train accident, Yvonne pleads with Gogol to save her husbandPerversely, he does so by grafting the hands of a recently executed murderer onto OrlacNot only is Orlac unable to resume his musical career, but he has suddenly developed a peculiar talent for throwing knives; he also has a bad habit of attempting to win arguments by throttling his opponentsGleefully exploiting his patient's torment, Gogol disguises himself as the executed killer and tries to convince Orlac that he, Orlac, was responsible for a recent murderIn a effort to prove her husband's innocence, Yvonne goes to Gogol's home and switches places with a lifesize replica of herself that the obsessive Gogol keeps in his living roomOnly the last-minute intervention of Orlac saves Yvonne from being strangled by the crazed GogolThe first of several film versions of Maurice Renard's The Hands of Orlac, Mad Love was directed by cinematographer Karl FreundIts deployment of certain visual elements that would later (consciously or otherwise) be adopted by Orson Welles in Citizen Kane brought Mad Love a surfeit of latter-day attention when Pauline Kael annotated the resemblances in her 1971 New Yorker article on Kane (MsKael's assessment of Mad Love as a "dismal, static horror film" is both unfair and untrue).(n)

programme.title: The Devil Doll
programme.desc: In this film, falsely convicted Lionel Barrymore escapes from Devil's Island with fellow prisoner H.BWalthallA brilliant scientist, Walthall reveals to Barrymore that he has developed a process to shrink human beingsUpon Walthall's death, Barrymore goes to the old scientist's lab, intending to use Walthall's formula to exact vengeance.(n)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
The Walking Dead: Cast and Creators Live at Paleyfest
programme.desc: A reformed criminal is framed and sent to the electric chair, but a scientist uses his corpse as part of his experiments and manages to resurrect him, although only as a vengeance seeking zombieThis was a rare excursion into the horror genre for director Curtis, better known for movies such as Casablanca.(n)

programme.title: The Return of Doctor X
programme.desc: Humphrey Bogart makes his first and last appearance in a horror movie in this filmThough the title implies that it is a sequel to the classic 1932 chiller DrX it is notThe terror begins when an eager-beaver reporter stumbles across the corpse of a popular actress who turns up, after much media hoopla, not to be dead at allAt least she seems to be alive on a surface level and is eager to sue the reporter's paperThe reporter can't help but notice that here skin is unnaturally pale and that she keeps her face concealed beneath a long-black veilSuspecting that evil is afoot, he--who by now is unemployed--launches a private investigation to prove that she really was the corpse he sawHis search leads him into the terrifying world of a psycho blood doctor, and into a series of unsolved murders in which all the victims were found with no blood in their veinsUltimately, the reporter finds himself face-to-face with the nefarious DrMaurice Xavier (Bogart), a man executed several years ago for murdering patients while performing Frankensteinian experiments.(n)

programme.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Hunchback of Notre Dame
programme.desc: Animated version of the Victor Hugo classic storyCondemned to stay inside Paris's Notre Dame cathedral by his evil guardian Frollo, Quasimodo the hunchbacked bell-ringer longs to see the outside worldOne day he escapes and meets the beautiful gypsy dancer Esmerelda, and his life is never the same againWith the voices of Tom Hulce, Demi Moore, Tony Jay, Kevin Kline, Paul Kandel and Jason Alexander.(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: While out on a call, Roy Neary, a power repairman, witnesses' unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana homeThis encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic eventsNeary tries desperately to understand what he has experiencedHe is baffled by the governmental cover-up that blocks his efforts, however, and finds himself increasingly driven to the emotional edgeHis wife cannot understand what is happening and finds her relationship with her husband disintegratingIn his quest, Neary clings to an ally in Jillian Guiler, who has witnessed with him the nocturnal encounterTogether, they pursue an answer to the extraordinary mystery that has engulfed themRichard Dreyfuss, Teri Garr and Melinda Dillon.(n)

programme.title: The Green Room
programme.desc: A death-obsessed journalist dives deeper into his madness as his friends rapidly die one by one during World War IAt the end of the war, the journalist is found building a massive shrine to the departed.(n)

programme.title: Day for Night
programme.desc: This film details the making of a drama called "Meet Pamela" about the tragedy that follows when a French man introduces his parents to his British wifeDirector François Truffaut satirizes his own films with "Meet Pamela"'s overwrought storyline, but the real focus is on the chaos behind the scenes.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Mary Crazy Larry
programme.desc: All-action chase movie in which two racing enthusiasts rob a supermarket and hit the road, pursued by the forces of law and orderHaving bought their dream sports car with the stolen cash, the reckless men embark on a speedy getaway across California, where they pick up a footloose hitchhiker - a sexy young woman who proves to be as crazy as the boys themselves.(n)

programme.title: Outlaw Blues
programme.desc: Peter Fonda as a songwriting ex-con pursuing the singer who stole his musicSusan Saint James, John Crawford, James CallahanHatch: Michael LernerElroy: Steve FromholzRichard THeffron directed.(n)

programme.title: Small Town Girl
programme.desc: A drunken, rich playboy proposes to a young woman from a rural town, and she acceptsHe has regrets the next day, but his parents insist they stay married for six months to avoid a scandal.(n)

programme.title: Glimpses of Australia
programme.desc: Australia is visited in this "Traveltalk" series entry.(n)

programme.title: Stage to Chino
programme.desc: In this western, a government postal inspector pretends to be a stagecoach driver so he can save his niece from ruination at the greedy hands of the crooked rival who is trying to sink her stage line.(n)

programme.title: The Falcon Out West
programme.desc: The murder of a playboy with rattlesnake venom sends the sleuth (Tom Conway) to the wild open spacesTex: Lyle TalbotMarion: Barbara HaleVanessa: Carole GallagherDirected by William Clemens.(n)

programme.title: Men of the Sky
programme.desc: No additional information is available.(n)

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Tulsa was, in 1949, the most elaborate production released to date by the Eagle-Lion corporation-though all evidence, especially the technical credits, suggests that the film was put together at Universal-International, then merely distriibuted by Eagle-Lion (who made a fortune at the box office)The film traces the matriculation of the sleepy Oklahoma village of Tulsa into a major oil center Susan Hayward stars as an amibitious cattleman's daughter who wishes to wreak vengeance on the encroaching oil interests but who becomes a "black gold" mogul herselfRobert Preston costars as a geologist who hopes to rescue his beloved Oklahoma from being utterly devastated by drilling and derricksThis being a late-1940s film, Greed runs a poor second to Good at film's end, with the oilmen and the conservations learning to work together rather than as bitter enemiesWhile the story is a good one, the true selling angle of Tulsa was its action sequences, notably a fire scene that must have cost as much as all the other Eagle-Lion releases of 1949 combinedOriginally lensed in vibrant Techicolor, Tulsa is usually seen today in washed-out, two-color Public Domain prints.(n)

programme.title: Somebody Up There Likes Me
programme.desc: The film that made Paul Newman a starAn accomplished and often brutal biopic of the boxing legend Rocky Graziano, who fought against his roots to become world championFeatures an early cameo from Steve McQueen.(n)

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: A recent divorcée is upset when her boyfriend decides with his two pals to round up "misfit" horses in Nevada and sell them for dog foodThe last film for stars Clark Gable and Marilyn MonroePlaywright Arthur Miller wrote the script.(n)

programme.title: The Gumball Rally
programme.desc: A turbo charged action comedy with some of the world's best racers gathering in an illegal rally across the USAWinner takes all.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Romeo and Juliet set in New York City, where rival street gangs (the Jets and the Sharks) battle for territory and respect.(n)

programme.title: Violent Playground
programme.desc: Violent Playground opens with a few West Side Story style shots of a Liverpool street gang, commandeered by a very nasty-looking David McCallumWe're going to be seeing a lot more of McCallum before the final fadeout: His sister (Anne Heywood) is in love with an upright police officer (Stanley Baker)The film plods along predictable grounds until the climactic rumble sequence, which is as good as anything ever seen in Hollywood "J.D." pictureViolent Playground didn't get much American play in 1957, principally because there was a glut of such films at the timeThe picture received a new lease on life in the early 1960s to cash in on the Man From UNCLE popularity of David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: The Asphalt Jungle
programme.desc: Seminal crime movie, remade countless times, with Sam Jaffe as the ageing criminal reuniting the gang for one last heistMarilyn Monroe co-stars.(n)

programme.title: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: A free soul who delivers autos makes a bet that he can drive from Denver to San Francisco in 15 hours, which leads to him being chased by the police through four states.(n)

programme.title: Three
programme.desc: This interesting drama centers on two friends touring EuropeThough they encounter many women, both of them find themselves attracted to the same English lassTo maintain their friendship, they both promise not to romance the girlThe trouble begins when one of the men breaks his promise.(n)

programme.title: The Window
programme.desc: In this melodrama, Bobby Driscoll stars as a young boy prone to fibsThus, no one believes Driscoll when he claims to have seen a murder in a neighboring apartmentNo one, that is, except the killersWith no help from his parents or the law, Driscoll must save himself.(n)

programme.title: Madame Curie
programme.desc: Biographical portrait of Marie Sklodowska, a Polish student in 1890s Paris, where she shares a laboratory with the noted professor Pierre CurieThey begin to fall in love as they collaborate and ultimately come to share the 1903 Nobel Prize in physics for their discovery of radiumA Best Picture nominee based on Eve Curie's book about her mother.(n)

programme.title: The Asphalt Jungle
programme.desc: Seminal crime movie, remade countless times, with Sam Jaffe as the ageing criminal reuniting the gang for one last heistMarilyn Monroe co-stars.(n)

programme.desc: Heartwrenching drama about a repressed spinster's struggles to break free from her overbearing mother and assert her independenceOn the advice of a skilled psychiatrist, she embarks on a cruise, during which she finds love and self-esteem for the first time in her lifeBut her new-found confidence is shaken when it is revealed her beau is a married man.(n)

programme.title: Rhapsody
programme.desc: A lush musical romance, with Elizabeth Taylor torn between her love for a great violinist (Vittorio Gassman), who's devoted to his art, and a young pianist.(n)

programme.title: Light in the Piazza
programme.desc: An American girl falls for an Italian prince - but should her parents reveal a dark secret about her past which explains her child-like behaviour? A star cast brings class and pace to this romantic drama.(n)

programme.desc: Lavish musical comedy starring Don Ameche as a nightclub entertainer who impersonates his double, a baron (also played by Ameche) and ends up in love with the man's wife Alice Faye.(n)

programme.title: You Can't Have Everything
programme.desc: Bright tale of a small-town playwright, a big-city songwriter and his fiancée.(n)

programme.title: The Better 'Ole
programme.desc: Silent World War I spy jinks about a happy-go-lucky British sergeant who uncovers a German agent in his regiment and, in the course of trying to out him, poses as one of the Kaiser's soldiers to gather evidence behind enemy linesSydney Chaplin, brother of Charles Chaplin, stars as the English noncom.(n)

programme.title: The Cars That Ate Paris
programme.desc: No, it's not about carnivorous cars chowing down on Frenchmen, but a horror comedy set in Paris, Australia, where the chief source of income is selling the salvage remaining from orchestrated automobile accidentsThose who survive the crashes are usually subjected to bizarre brain experiments by the local mad scientist.(n)

programme.title: The Plumber
programme.desc: In this Australian made-for-TV film, the plumber shows up at the door of a well-to-do Australian coupleThough the plumber apparently hasn't been summoned, he is given unquestioned free reign in the householdHe ends up staying several days, his work and personality growing weirder with each passing day.(n)

programme.desc: Fleeing from her wedding to a titled fortune hunter, a bride (Wendy Barrie) gets involved with one of her father's employees (Kent Taylor)Paul: Rafael StormJay: Thurston HallR.C.: George BarbierMrsMorgan: Cecil CunninghamMrsBaldwin: Nella WalkerFrank Woodruff directed.(n)

programme.title: Housewife
programme.desc: Bette Davis plays the "other woman" in this story of a young man (George Brent) in the advertising businessNan: Ann DvorakDupray: John HallidayWilson: Hobart CavanaughDora: Ruth DonnellyBlake: Robert BarratJenny: Leila BennettSinger: Phil ReganDirected by Alfred EGreen.(n)

programme.title: Let's Try Again
programme.desc: In this drama, a doctor and his wife find themselves dreaming of others and thinking about divorceThe wife decides to sow a few oats when she meets a handsome young manWhen the doctor finds out about the affair, he is surprised to discover that after 10 years of marriage, he could care lessThey begin divorce proceedings, but just before it is finalized, they realize that their love isn't as dead as they had thought, and the relationship is renewed.(n)

programme.title: Their Own Desire
programme.desc: This stagebound early talkie stars Norma Shearer as a wealthy young woman in love with wealthy young man Robert MontgomeryThese wealthy young folk have wealthy older widowed parents, played by Lewis Stone (Shearer's father) and Helene Millard (Montgomery's mother)The wealthy older people also fall in love with each other, complicating the affairs of the wealthy younger peopleIsn't anyone in an MGM movie ever poor besides Wallace Beery (who isn't in this one)? Norma Shearer personally selected Robert Montgomery as her leading man in Their Own Desire; the box office success of this pairing encouraged the rest of MGM's acting crop to call upon Montgomery early and often.(n)

programme.title: Age of Indiscretion
programme.desc: Because financial setbacks force publisher Robert Lenhart (Paul Lukas) to cut costs at home as well at work, his extravagant wife Eve (Helen Vinson) is furious, although his secretary Maxine Bennett (Madge Evans), who secretly loves him, is sympatheticEventually, Eve leaves Robert for wealthy Felix Shaw (Ralph Forbes), forcing Robert to explain what "divorce" means to his young son Bill (David Jack Holt)When Felix's haughty mother Emma (May Robson) decides she wants a grandson, she decides to wrest Bill away from Robert by whatever means necessary.(n)

programme.title: Man on Fire
Man On Fire
programme.desc: A messy divorce leads to an ugly custody battle in this drama that features Bing Crosby in a dramatic role.(n)

programme.title: Wednesday's Child
programme.desc: A child is forced to attend military school after his parents divorce.(n)

programme.title: Divorce in the Family
programme.desc: Forced to decide between a domineering stepfather and his free-wheeling natural father a young lad decides he needs someone to keep him in line and goes with his stepdadThis dramatic soap opera was a vehicle for top MGM child star Jackie Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Child of Divorce
programme.desc: An 11-year-old girl is torn between her parents during the bitter custody battle following their divorce.(n)

programme.title: One Is a Lonely Number
programme.desc: A young woman is deserted by her professor husband and has to adjust to a life on her ownShe forms a platonic relationship with a kindly local grocer, but matters become more complicated when she meets a married man at an art gallery.(n)

programme.title: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: A free-loving, status-climbing dancer murders her rich paramour, then takes up with a succession of other lovers, gradually descending to the streets as a hooker -- where she has the incredible misfortune to proposition Jack the Ripper! Pandora's Box is an acknowledged masterpiece of sensual imagery.(n)

programme.title: The Little Princess
programme.desc: Shirley Temple's first Technicolor feature, The Little Princess was inspired by the oft-filmed novel by Frances Hodgson BurnettSet in turn-of-the-century England, the film finds Temple being enrolled in a boarding school by her wealthy widowed father (Ian Hunter), who must head off to fight in the Boer WarAt first, Temple is treated like royalty; her behavior couldn't be more down to earth, but this preferential treatment foments resentmentWhen her father is reported killed in the war, circumstances are severely alteredThe spiteful headmistress (Mary Nash) relegates Temple to servant status and forces the girl to sleep in a drafty atticShe keeps her spirits up by hoping against hope that her father will return, and to that end she haunts the corridors of a nearby military hospitalQueen Victoria doesn't have to make a guest appearance in the tearfully joyous closing sequence, but it does serve as icing on the cake to this, one of Temple's most enjoyable feature filmsReliable Shirley Temple flick supporting actors Cesar Romero and Arthur Treacher are back in harness in The Little Princess, while adult leading lady Anita Louise figures prominently in a sugary dream sequence.(n)
